choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Subject: Notification of Departure from Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have made the difficult decision to leave the company effective immediately. My last day with the company will be [date].

I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences that I have gained while working at this company. It has been a pleasure working with such talented and dedicated individuals, and I am grateful for their support and guidance throughout my tenure here.

I want to assure you that all of my current projects are on track and will be completed successfully before I leave. Additionally, I will do everything in my power to ensure that any ongoing tasks or commitments are fulfilled to the best of my abilities.

If there is anything else I can do to help with the transition, please let me know. Thank you for your understanding and support during this difficult time.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
